title: Your Game Is Bugged Since New Patch
body: There is no champs to select in lobby it's happened 3 times in a row but each time I have gone through a client repair to try and fix issue still left with a blank screen in lobby and nothing to click on. Note this is a new account and I have been told in the last two lobbies that you have to buy champs to play otherwise you can't play anything. But let me ask you this how can I buy champs on a new account without spending money on them I can't go into a match to earn IP to buy champs when I can't get into a match. So is this RIOTS new way of forcing people into spending money on game now?

replies.body:
That was indeed a bug we noticed rather quickly happening to players lower than level 10 on OCE. Thankfully I was able to notice quick enough, and we pushed out a fix that enables the normal champion rotation for everyone. 

Have you been able to see champions in that lobby yet?
